title: Here's what Delhi and Mumbai love to eat: NRAIâ€™s comprehensive food order report
description: A recent study by the National Restaurant Association of India reveals that Delhi-NCR residents favor North Indian snacks over international dishes. The organized food service sector in the region is valued at Rs 42,002 crore. Delhiites dine out frequently, preferring fine dining, while Gurugram residents opt for quick-service restaurants. The report also highlights increasing dining-out habits post-pandemic and issues with food delivery apps.
